REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f6665 reute d f BC-GE-<GE>-GETS-27.4-MLN 03-17 0055

TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> GETS 27.4 MLN DLR NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: General Electric Co's Aircraft Engine Business Group is being awarded 27.4 mln dlr contract for ancillary equipment for the F110 engine and the F-14A aircraft, the Defense Department said. It said work on the contract is expected to be completed in October 1988. Reuter
